column4: hey all i had a quick question with regards to security ... does the # of open ports really contribute to the security of a system? or the lack thereof?

it's not the number of open ports, it's the number of different applications listening to them. One application with 64000 ports open is less of a problem than 1000 applications with a single port each
basically you want to not have things you don't need running.
ok thanks .. so ive got a mini issue on my hands
